room_title: Escape room "Sacred Ruins" by Locked Inn in Florence (SC)
room_description:
You're on a team of archaeologists in search of the infamous treasure of Shara Itu. Youâ€™ve heard that the treasure is the most prized possession in the world, but the spirits that dwell within the temple are the most deadly! If you enter, you awaken those evil spirits, so you must leave within an hour of sunset. It's now the last day of the expedition and you've made it to the temple entrance, but the sun just went down...
WILL YOU MAKE IT OUT ALIVE?
